scripts.dev: concurrently -n PARCEL,NODEMON -c bgBlue.bold,bgGreen.bold "parcel watch index.html" "nodemon --quiet -w dist -e js,css,html --delay 200ms -x 'npm run sync-docs'"
scripts.sync-docs: { rm -rf ../../docs && cp -R dist ../../docs && sed -i '' 's|<script type="module" src="[^"]*"></script>|<script type="module" src="/die-roboter/die-roboter-example.8ed14f75.js"></script>|' ../../docs/index.html; } >/dev/null 2>&1
